app.name: Verbatim Studio
app.description: A privacy-first application for transcribing audio and video files. All processing happens locally on the user's device - no data is sent to external servers.

navigation.label: Dashboard
navigation.description: Overview stats, recent recordings, quick actions, onboarding tour

navigation.label: Recordings
navigation.description: Upload audio/video files, apply templates, start transcription, bulk operations

navigation.label: Projects
navigation.description: Organize recordings with custom project types, metadata schemas, and analytics

navigation.label: Documents
navigation.description: Upload PDFs and images with OCR text extraction, add page-anchored notes

navigation.label: Chats
navigation.description: View and resume saved AI conversation sessions

navigation.label: Search
navigation.description: Keyword or semantic (AI-powered) search across recordings, documents, and notes

navigation.label: Files
navigation.description: Browse folder structure, move files between storage locations

navigation.label: Settings
navigation.description: Configure transcription, AI models, storage locations, backup/restore

features.name: Audio/Video Transcription
features.description: Convert audio and video files to text using local WhisperX AI models with optional speaker diarization
steps: Navigate to Recordings in the sidebar
Drag and drop files or click Upload
Enter a title and optional metadata
Optionally select a recording template
Click Transcribe to start processing
Wait for status to change to Completed
Click the recording to view the transcript

features.name: Recording Templates
features.description: Reusable templates with custom metadata fields for recordings
steps: Create a template with custom fields
When uploading a recording, select the template
Fill in the custom metadata fields

features.name: Project Types
features.description: Custom metadata schemas for projects (similar to recording templates)
steps: Create a project type with custom fields
When creating a project, select the type
Fill in project-level metadata

features.name: Transcript Editing
features.description: Edit transcript text, manage speakers, add highlights and comments

features.name: Speaker Identification
features.description: Automatically identify and label different speakers in a recording

features.name: Segment Highlights
features.notes: One highlight per segment, bulk operations supported

features.name: Tags
features.description: Color-coded labels for organizing and filtering recordings

features.name: Project Organization
features.description: Group related recordings into projects with custom metadata and analytics
steps: Navigate to Projects
Click New Project
Enter name and select project type (optional)
Assign recordings from the Recordings page

features.name: Semantic Search
features.how_it_works: Uses vector embeddings to find conceptually related content, not just exact text matches
features.vs_keyword: Keyword search finds exact text matches; semantic search finds related meanings

features.name: AI Chat Assistant
features.description: Ask questions about your transcripts and documents using AI
steps: Click the chat bubble icon
Click attachment icon to add context
Select recordings or documents
Type your question and press Enter

features.name: AI Analysis
analysis_types: Summarization (summary, key points, action items, topics)

features.name: Live Transcription
features.description: Transcribe speech in real-time from your microphone
steps: Navigate to Live
Click Connect
Allow microphone access
Select language
Speak to see real-time transcription
Click Save to keep the session as a recording

formats.name: VTT
formats.description: WebVTT subtitle format for web video

features.name: Document Management
features.description: Upload and process documents with OCR text extraction

features.name: Notes
features.description: Contextual notes anchored to specific locations

features.name: Backup and Restore
features.description: Export and import full database backups

transcription.model: Whisper model size (tiny, base, small, medium, large)
transcription.device: CPU or GPU (CUDA for Nvidia, MPS for Apple Silicon)
transcription.batch_size: Processing chunks (higher = faster but more memory)
transcription.huggingface_token: Required for diarization and some models

ai_llm.models: Download and manage chat AI models (Mistral, Llama, etc.)
ai_llm.gpu_layers: How much to offload to GPU

ocr.models: Download and manage OCR models for document text extraction

storage.locations: Add local, network, or cloud storage

backup.import: Restore from backup file with merge options

troubleshooting.solution: Navigate to Settings > AI/LLM and download a model
Try converting to MP3/WAV, use a smaller model (tiny/base), or switch to CPU
Use a smaller model, enable GPU acceleration, increase batch size, close other apps
Enable diarization in Settings > Transcription. Requires HuggingFace token.
Check microphone permission, system audio settings, try reconnecting
Download OCR models in Settings > OCR
Navigate to Settings > Storage and click Re-authenticate
Check network connection, re-authenticate OAuth, verify path exists
Embeddings generate automatically but may take time. Try keyword search or rephrase query.
Ensure AI model is downloaded and activated in Settings > AI/LLM, check connection status
Ensure transcription is complete, check disk space
Check archive version compatibility, ensure file isn't corrupted, verify disk space
